title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya Season 2 (2009) Ep. 08 & 12-24
description:
This is the official Haruhi Suzumiya Season 2!! ;D
(And of course it is Japanese with English subs >.<)
Its quite boring that all episodes "Endless Eight" episodes are all the same... ==' I got veery confused when I was gonna watch this and especially with all different fansub groups & different file names XD

with the mistaken/incorrect order this is Episode 01-13

So to start off im really sorry about my last torrent, this one wont fail ;D
Mazui fansubs have made a new version of every episode now, all their episodes are now 720p so I will only choose them in this torrent :)

!!I will probably only seed this every second week!!
So PLS help me seed ffs :D >.> If noones seeding this torrent might fail and I wont feel like trying to fix it again

Anyways!! I will upload a new torrent when all episodes have been released ^_^
And then I really recommend you to read the Credits_v2.txt ^^

If you want an XviD (.avi) version, feel free to request it ^.^
Or if you want a torrent with another fansub group :] ( I really like SMC but their not in HD :/ )

If anyone have an opinion of which fansub group is the best out of those who release in HD, plz tell me ^-^
These are the once:

CoalGrils/CoalGuys/CoalGG
Gleam
P-Bfs

The non-HD onces are:

SMC
a.f.k.
DB_L-E
Shoku-dan
Chirio

(Look in Credits_v2.txt for more info) ^w^

Thx for ur time and SEED 8D <3
